TopicTitle: Interface - Sort parts by default based on type and modules in part.cfg

Articles.Content:
I'm so tired of not finding what I want in the parts list. The current method of displaying parts in load order makes absolutely no sense and is easy to fix.

Example of proper sorting:

Command modules crew 1 cheapest to most expensive. Crew 2 (if any) Crew 3...

Unmanned cheapest to most expensive.

Fuel - 1.5m smallest capacity to largest

Fuel - 2.5m smallest capacity to largest

SRBs - smallest capacity to largest

Should also be able to sort based on addon modules in the part.cfg (maybe by editing the sort.cfg file)

I'd really like to see an overhaul of the VAB/SPH parts selection UI. I'm currently assuming this is something that will be looked at later.

My suggestions would be a number of sort options, rather than a fixed order. So I could choose price, size, weight etc. depending upon needs. I'd also like a filtering tool so I can show only parts containing RCS, for example. In combination these two should allow easy location of parts.

Also I'd prefer a scrolling parts list. The current 'page' system seems to me to be a bit sluggish and jerky, rather than the nice smooth transition provided by a scrollable list. It's a minor niggle really but something I have thought about quite a lot!

I only suggest the above sort as a default. It should be sortable as you suggest by filtering a part type and size if applicable and further sorting by price, capacity, ISP, charge or thrust / mass...
I wish there were tags assigned to each parts, and the ability to add your own custom tags. This way you could search for the part you need at your leisure.

There are multiple mods to do this currently, all great, but some stock functionality is needed. I think the first and second posts pretty much cover anything and everything people want and need for sorting.

+1'd
